releaseNotes:
Easy Workflow Changeloge.
[1.1.0] - 2025-05-16
Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Solid Button Color Update: Changed default color from red to white for better visibility.
- Shape Button Replaced: Removed Shape button and added Bounce button with a bounce expression for animations.
- Shape Button Replaced: Removed Shape button and added Bounce button with a bounce expression for animations
- UI Tweak: Increased button spacing in the Layer Creation panel for easier clicking.
